title: DYING_S0UL
author: DYING_S0UL
content: Hey, has anyone facing this error? SSL handshake failed Error code 525I have tried to change browser but it won't go away. I don't know if it's my side problem or bitcointalk side. Even 5 minutes ago everything was fine. Now I'm unable to login. Recently there was a fire in our main ISP provider company. That's why 70% wifi was down throughout the whole country. I don't know if that caused it. Other sites like youtube, facebook are still working. Weird.Note: Miraculously got Fixed.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: It was down 11 minutes ago, but now the forum working fine.Quote from: https://www.isitdownrightnow.com/bitcointalk.org.htmlWebsite Name: Bitcoin TalkURL Checked: bitcointalk.orgResponse Time: 13.96 ms.Last Down: 11 mins ago

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on October 27, 2023, 04:05:30 AMIt was down 11 minutes ago, but now the forum working fine.Yes. No need to worry. I understand that threads like this are opened when access to the forum is not available for a long period of time, but for such a short period of time it can be for any unimportant reason. I would lock the thread.
